page.title: 17Recreation in Hartlepool
page.content: {8. Is the beach safe and clean?} Most of the beach is safe except when spring and autumn tides are high. Some parts of the beach have been polluted by oil and coal, and by the litter dropped by people using the beach and ships using the bay. {9. Is there a professional football {ground?} Hartlepool United football team play in the 4th Division of the Football League at the Victoria Ground in Clarence Road. Matches are usually played on Saturdays, occasionally on Sundays. Admission fee is Â£2 for adults, Â£1 for children. {10. Are there other spectator sports? Greyhound and Stock Car Racing events are held regularly at the Clarence Rd. Stadium. Cricket is played at Park Drive. Soccor and Rugby are played by local amateur teams at Rift House Recreation Ground and Grayfields.
